data.meanings: to be white. qamarun - moon (especially from the 3rd to 26th night).
data.sentence: The word وَالْقَمَرِ comes from the root ق م ر and is associated with the meanings: to be white. qamarun - moon (especially from the 3rd to 26th night).
The word اتَّسَقَ comes from the root و س ق and is associated with the meanings: to gather/collect what is scattered.
